titles: A short vindication of The relapse and the provok'd wife from immorality and prophaneness by the author.
author: Vanbrugh, John, Sir, 1664-1726.
notes: Attributed to John Vanbrugh.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
A reply to Jeremy Collier's, A short view of the immorality and profaness of the English stage.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726. --  Short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage.
